8.28.20  9:53 pm   Are you aware of how intoxicatingly inspiring a lot of your answers here can be? At least three of your responses to questions here have become minor mantras for my life, and from how many people thank you on here, I can only assume a bunch of other people feel the same. I hope you achieve everything you want to do despite how impossible it seems.
